atk-s0402a1:1_6: Suddhaṁ attānanti idaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:1_12: balaṁ āgammāti sattannaṁ sekhānaṁ ñāṇabalaṁ ārabbha sandhāya paṭicca.
atk-s0402a1:1_16: Yasmā panetāni dvepi vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a1:2_1: Dutiye satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvetītiādīsu ayaṁ heṭṭhā anāgatānaṁ padānaṁ vasena atthavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0402a1:2_9: Tathā hi satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:2_14: Te hi na kevalaṁ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesuyeva bojjhaṅge uddharanti,
atk-s0402a1:2_17: Tasmā tesaṁ matena etesaṁ jhānānaṁ pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:3_0: Kevalaṁ hettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0402a1:3_6: Tathā hi ayaṁ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0402a1:3_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṁ pariṇamantaṁ pariṇatañca,
atk-s0402a1:3_10: Ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṁ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati,
atk-s0402a1:4_0: Idha pana nibbānaṁyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko,
atk-s0402a1:4_4: tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:4_6: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṁ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0402a1:4_7: ca pariṇataṁ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a1:4_9: Iti ime satta bojjhaṅgā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
atk-s0402a1:4_10: Imesupi dvīsu balesu etadaggabhāvo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:5_1: Tatiye vivicceva kāmehītiādīnaṁ catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ pāḷiattho ca bhāvanānayo ca sabbo sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritoyeva.
atk-s0402a1:5_2: Imāni pana cattāri jhānāni eko bhikkhu cittekaggatthāya bhāveti,
atk-s0402a1:5_8: Ayaṁ hi bhikkhu imāni jhānāni samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā hetupaccayapariggahaṁ
atk-s0402a1:5_9: katvā sappaccayaṁ nāmarūpañca vavatthapetvā indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a1:6_1: Catutthe saṁkhittena ca vitthārena cāti saṁkhittadhammadesanā vitthāradhammadesanā cāti dveyeva dhammadesanāti dasseti.
atk-s0402a1:6_2: Tattha mātikaṁ uddisitvā kathitā desanā saṁkhittadesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a1:6_3: Tameva mātikaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a1:6_4: Mātikaṁ vā ṭhapetvāpi aṭṭhapetvāpi vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a1:6_5: Tāsu saṁkhittadesanā nāma mahāpaññassa puggalassa vasena kathitā,
atk-s0402a1:6_7: Mahāpaññassa hi vitthāradesanā atipapañco viya hoti.
atk-s0402a1:6_8: Mandapaññassa saṅkhepadesanā sasakassa uppatanaṁ viya hoti,
atk-s0402a1:6_9: neva antaṁ na koṭiṁ pāpuṇituṁ sakkoti.
atk-s0402a1:6_12: Sakalampi hi tepiṭakaṁ saṅkhepadesanā vitthāradesanāti ettheva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
atk-s0402a1:7_6: kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ yasmiṁ adhikaraṇe.
atk-s0402a1:7_7: Āpanno ca bhikkhūti āpattiṁ āpanno bhikkhu ca.
atk-s0402a1:7_12: Bhikkhū ca na phāsuṁ viharissantīti aññamaññaṁ vivādāpanne bhikkhusaṅghe yepi uddesaṁ vā paripucchaṁ vā gahetukāmā padhānaṁ vā anuyuñjitukāmā,
atk-s0402a1:7_14: Bhikkhusaṅghasmiṁ hi uposathapavāraṇāya ṭhitāya uddesādīhi atthikā uddesādīni gahetuṁ na sakkonti,
atk-s0402a1:7_17: Evaṁ bhikkhū ca na phāsuṁ viharissanti.
atk-s0402a1:8_2: Akusalaṁ āpannoti ettha akusalanti āpatti adhippetā,
atk-s0402a1:8_5: āpattiyā pana kañcideva desaṁ aññataraṁ āpattinti attho.
atk-s0402a1:8_11: Accayo accagamāti aparādho atikkamitvā madditvā gato,
atk-s0402a1:8_13: Suṅkadāyakaṁva bhaṇḍasminti yathā suṅkaṭṭhānaṁ pariharitvā nīte bhaṇḍasmiṁ suṅkadāyakaṁ aparādho abhibhavati,
atk-s0402a1:9_1: yo hi raññā ṭhapitaṁ suṅkaṭṭhānaṁ pariharitvā bhaṇḍaṁ harati,
atk-s0402a1:9_2: taṁ saha bhaṇḍasakaṭena ānetvā rañño dassenti.
atk-s0402a1:9_6: evamevaṁ yaṁ so bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpanno,
atk-s0402a1:9_9: Tīhi pana kāraṇehi tasseva bhikkhuno doso.
atk-s0402a1:9_13: Codakassa pana yaṁ so taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjantaṁ addasa,
atk-s0402a1:9_16: Tampi amanasikaritvā ayaṁ bhikkhu attanova dosaṁ paccavekkhanto “iti mameva tattha accayo accagamā suṅkadāyakaṁva
atk-s0402a1:9_18: Dutiyavāre codakassa anattamanatā ca anattamanatāya coditabhāvo cāti dve dosā,
atk-s0402a1:9_19: tesaṁ vasena “accayo accagamā”ti ettha yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0402a1:10_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:10_5: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0402a1:10_6: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a1:10_12: Atha vā evaṁ gato tato āsannataraṁ ṭhānaṁ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṁ gantvātipi vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a1:11_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodīti yathā ca khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-s0402a1:11_1: evaṁ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṁ samappavattamodo ahosi,
atk-s0402a1:11_2: sītodakaṁ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṁ ekībhāvaṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a1:11_7: kacci bhoto gotamassa ca sāvakānañca appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-s0402a1:11_8: taṁ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātassa sammodassa jananato sammodituṁ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:11_9: atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṁ sāretuṁ nirantaraṁ pavattetuṁ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:11_13: atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṁ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ kathaṁ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhapetvā yenatthena āgato,
atk-s0402a1:12_1: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṁ nisinno hoti,
atk-s0402a1:12_5: Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhānīyaṁ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṁ nisīdanti.
atk-s0402a1:13_0: Kathaṁ nisinno pana ekamantaṁ nisinno hotīti?
atk-s0402a1:13_7: Atidūre nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0402a1:13_16: Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0402a1:14_4: kiṁ akusala”nti iminā nayena agārikapucchā āgatā.
atk-s0402a1:14_7: Ayaṁ pana attano anurūpaṁ agārikapucchaṁ pucchanto etaṁ “ko nu kho,
atk-s0402a1:14_18: Adhammacariyā ca sā visamacariyā cāti adhammacariyāvisamacariyā.
atk-s0402a1:14_20: Atthato panettha adhammacariyāvisamacariyā nāma dasa akusalakammapathā,
atk-s0402a1:15_1: bho gotamāti ettha ayaṁ abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanesu dissati.
atk-s0402a1:15_5: “Ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-s0402a1:16_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṁ;
atk-s0402a1:20_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṁ budho”ti. –
atk-s0402a1:21_0: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṁsāvasena cāyaṁ dvikkhattuṁ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:21_1: Atha vā abhikkantanti abhikkantaṁ atiiṭṭhaṁ atimanāpaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:22_6: abhikkantaṁ yadidaṁ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṁ āgamma mama pasādoti.
atk-s0402a1:22_7: Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṁ dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi –
atk-s0402a1:23_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṁyeva thometi.
atk-s0402a1:23_7: Maggaṁ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0402a1:24_2: evaṁ saddhammavimukhaṁ asaddhamme patitaṁ maṁ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0402a1:24_4: evaṁ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṁ sāsanaṁ vivarantena,
atk-s0402a1:24_8: evaṁ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṁsakadesanāpajjotadhāraṇena
atk-s0402a1:24_9: mayhaṁ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0402a1:25_0: Evaṁ desanaṁ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṁ karonto esāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a1:25_2: Bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti bhavaṁ me gotamo saraṇaṁ parāyaṇaṁ aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātāti
atk-s0402a1:25_3: iminā adhippāyena bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi,
atk-s0402a1:25_7: Tasmā gacchāmīti imassa jānāmi bujjhāmīti ayamattho vutto.
atk-s0402a1:25_8: Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjamāne ca catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
atk-s0402a1:25_13: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0402a1:28_3: Appaṭikūlaṁ madhuramimaṁpaguṇaṁ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0402a1:30_0: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṁ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0402a1:31_0: Bhikkhūnaṁ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0402a1:33_2: saraṇagatānaṁ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṁ santāsaṁ dukkhaṁ duggatiparikilesaṁ hanati vināsetīti attho,
atk-s0402a1:33_4: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṁ bhayaṁ hiṁsatīti buddho,
atk-s0402a1:33_5: bhavakantārā uttāraṇena lokassa assāsadānena ca dhammo,
atk-s0402a1:33_10: vuttappakārena cittuppādena “etāni me tīṇi ratanāni saraṇaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:33_12: Evaṁ tāva saraṇaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ yo ca saraṇaṁ gacchati idaṁ tayaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:34_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ lokuttaraṁ lokiyañcāti.
atk-s0402a1:34_1: Tattha lokuttaraṁ diṭṭhasaccānaṁ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṁ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati.
atk-s0402a1:34_2: Lokiyaṁ puthujjanānaṁ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṁ hutvā ijjhati.
atk-s0402a1:34_4: saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyāvatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a1:35_0: Tayidaṁ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātenāti.
atk-s0402a1:35_1: Tattha attasanniyyātanaṁ nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ attānaṁ buddhassa niyyātemi,
atk-s0402a1:35_4: Tapparāyaṇatā nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ buddhaparāyaṇo,
atk-s0402a1:35_6: saṅghaparāyaṇo iti maṁ dhārethā”ti evaṁ tapparāyaṇabhāvo.
atk-s0402a1:35_7: Sissabhāvūpagamanaṁ nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ buddhassa antevāsiko,
atk-s0402a1:35_9: saṅghassa iti maṁ dhārethā”ti evaṁ sissabhāvūpagamo.
atk-s0402a1:35_10: Paṇipāto nāma “ajja ādiṁ katvā ahaṁ abhivādana-paccuṭṭhāna-añjalikamma-sāmīcikammaṁ buddhādīnaṁyeva tiṇṇaṁ
atk-s0402a1:35_11: vatthūnaṁ karomi iti maṁ dhārethā”ti evaṁ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro.
atk-s0402a1:35_12: Imesañhi catunnampi ākārānaṁ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṁyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:36_7: buddho me saraṇaṁ leṇaṁ tāṇa”nti evampi attasanniyyātanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:36_13: bhagavantameva passeyya”nti evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamane viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a1:37_0: “So ahaṁ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṁ purā puraṁ;
atk-s0402a1:39_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a1:39_1: “Atha kho brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati,
atk-s0402a1:40_5: Tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā “buddho amhākaṁ ñātako”ti vandati,
atk-s0402a1:40_7: Yo vā “samaṇo gotamo rājapūjito mahānubhāvo avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyā”ti bhayena vandati,
atk-s0402a1:40_9: Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike kiñci uggahitaṁ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
atk-s0402a1:44_0: Evaṁ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṁ “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṁ na bhijjati,
atk-s0402a1:44_3: So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.
atk-s0402a1:44_4: Tathā yaṁ kiñci sippaṁ sikkhāpakaṁ titthiyaṁ “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjatīti evaṁ saraṇagamanappabhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:45_0: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:46_0: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṁ gato;
atk-s0402a1:52_0: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasenapetassa ānisaṁsaphalaṁ veditabbaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:53_3: yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṁ niccato upagaccheyya,
atk-s0402a1:54_0: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:60_0: “Atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami…pe…
atk-s0402a1:60_1: ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca –
atk-s0402a1:60_5: Buddhasaraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
atk-s0402a1:60_6: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi
atk-s0402a1:62_0: Tattha lokiyasaraṇagamanaṁ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṁsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṁkilissati,
atk-s0402a1:62_3: Lokiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca.
atk-s0402a1:62_9: Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṁ satthāraṁ na uddisatīti evaṁ saraṇagamanassa saṁkileso ca bhedo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:63_0: Upāsakaṁmaṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretūti maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṁ dhāretu,
atk-s0402a1:64_0: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci saraṇagato gahaṭṭho. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:66_2: So hi buddhaṁ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṁ,
atk-s0402a1:69_0: Ko ājīvoti. Pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvikakappanaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0402a1:71_1: Yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti,
atk-s0402a1:71_3: Apica yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca patikuṭṭho ca,
atk-s0402a1:71_5: Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0402a1:72_2: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
atk-s0402a1:73_1: Yā cassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca,
atk-s0402a1:73_3: Ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha –
atk-s0402a1:74_2: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca.
atk-s0402a1:75_0: Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṁ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati.
atk-s0402a1:75_2: āvarāmi dvāraṁ nigaṇṭhānaṁ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati.
atk-s0402a1:75_8: vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā,
atk-s0402a1:75_13: Tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṁ ādiṁ katvāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a1:76_3: anaññasatthukaṁ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṁ gataṁ upāsakaṁ kappiyakārakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu jānātu.
atk-s0402a1:76_4: Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṁ chindeyya,
atk-s0402a1:76_5: neva buddhaṁ “na buddho”ti vā dhammaṁ “na dhammo”ti vā saṅghaṁ “na saṅgho”ti vā vadeyyanti evaṁ attasanniyyātanena
atk-s0402a1:76_6: saraṇaṁ gantvā catūhi ca paccayehi pavāretvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ
atk-s0402a1:77_1: Sattame jāṇussoṇīti jāṇussoṇiṭhānantaraṁ kira nāmekaṁ ṭhānantaraṁ,
atk-s0402a1:77_4: Ayaṁ tasmiṁ kule jātattā rañño santike ca laddhajāṇussoṇisakkārattā jāṇussoṇīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a1:77_5: Tenupasaṅkamīti “samaṇo kira gotamo paṇḍito byatto bahussuto”ti sutvā “sace so liṅgavibhattikārakādibhedaṁ jānissati,
atk-s0402a1:77_9: aññātaṁ kiṁ kathessatī”ti cintetvā mānaddhajaṁ paggayha siṅgaṁ ukkhipitvā mahāparivārehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a1:77_11: akatattā cāti satthā tassa vacanaṁ sutvā “ayaṁ brāhmaṇo idha āgacchanto na jānitukāmo atthagavesī hutvā āgato,
atk-s0402a1:77_12: mānaṁ pana paggayha siṅgaṁ ukkhipitvā āgato.
atk-s0402a1:77_13: Kiṁ nu khvassa yathā pañhassa atthaṁ jānāti,
atk-s0402a1:77_15: udāhu yathā na jānātī”ti cintetvā “yathā na jānāti,
atk-s0402a1:77_16: evaṁ kathite vaḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “katattā ca, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0402a1:78_0: Brāhmaṇo taṁ sutvā “samaṇo gotamo katattāpi akatattāpi niraye nibbattiṁ vadati,
atk-s0402a1:78_1: idaṁ ubhayakāraṇenāpi ekaṭṭhāne nibbattiyā kathitattā dujjānaṁ mahandhakāraṁ,
atk-s0402a1:78_4: brāhmaṇānaṁ majjhe kathanakālepi maṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ –
atk-s0402a1:78_5: ‘tvaṁ samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṁ mānaṁ paggayha siṅgaṁ ukkhipitvā gatosi,
atk-s0402a1:78_6: ekavacaneneva tuṇhī hutvā kiñci vattuṁ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0402a1:78_8: Tasmā parājitopi aparājitasadiso hutvā puna saggagamanapañhaṁ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā ko nu kho,
atk-s0402a1:79_4: Satthā purimanayeneva cintetvā yathā na jānāti,
atk-s0402a1:79_8: na īdisassa purisassa santikaṁ āgatena ajānitvā gantuṁ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a1:79_9: sakavādaṁ pahāya samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ anuvattitvā mayhaṁ atthaṁ gavesissāmi,
atk-s0402a1:79_10: paralokamaggaṁ sodhessāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṁ katvā satthāraṁ āyācanto na kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a1:79_11: Athassa nihatamānataṁ ñatvā satthā upari desanaṁ vaḍḍhento tena hi,
atk-s0402a1:79_14: Yasmā saṁkhittena bhāsitassa atthaṁ ajānanto vitthāradesanaṁ yācasi,
atk-s0402a1:81_1: Dasame dunnikkhittañca padabyañjananti uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitapāḷipadameva hi atthassa byañjanattā byañjananti vuccati.
atk-s0402a1:81_3: Attho ca dunnītoti parivattetvā uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitā aṭṭhakathā.
atk-s0402a1:81_6: padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hotīti parivattetvā uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitāya pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathā nāma dunnayā dunnīhārā dukkathā nāma hoti.
